description: Detects suspicious IIS native-code module installations via command line
false_positives: Unknown as it may vary from organisation to arganisation how admins use to install IIS modules
name: IIS Native-Code Module Command Line Installation
query: (process.executable:*\\appcmd.exe AND process.command_line:*install* AND process.command_line:*module* AND process.command_line:*\/name\:*)
author: Florian Roth
